title: Constant disconnect on PVP.net for Mac
body: Every time i sign into may account, on the starting homepage there is a constant flickering message saying cannot connect to PVP.net. I saw that the solution for Windows is to simply disable IP helper, however mac does not have that. (Please do not respond with "get a real PC")

replies.body:
There are a number of settings that can cause these issues for a Mac. The biggest one is being on WiFi, but there are a number of others listed in our [**Mac Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) that I'd like you to take a look at.

Please let me know if this helped resolve the issue.
This article did not help. I think the league client is bugged because in game I have no issues it is only in the client. I also reinstalled and everything twice, both did not help

Since you're still having issues, this likely requires more advanced troubleshooting methods from our tech specialists. I'd like you to grab some logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you run into troubles with that.
